name: StoreLayer Framework
short_description: A messaging framework for java client server application. It enhances productivity by providing generic infrastructure for data CRUD. Java swing, Jide,Tibco rendezvous, Tibco smartsocket, Spring amqp are currently supported and it easy to add others.
